sentences.sContent: Background Drowning is defined as death due to submersion in liquid.
sentences.sContent_eng: Background Drowning is defined as death due to submersion in liquid.
sentences.sCn: 溺死是指淹没于液体之中发生的死亡。

sentences.sContent: Unless rescued by a trained lifeguard, these drowning people can only struggle on the surface of the water from 20 to 60 seconds before submersion occurs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Unless rescued by a trained lifeguard, these drowning people can only struggle on the surface of the water from 20 to 60 seconds before submersion occurs.
sentences.sCn: 除非是被训练有素的急救员救起，溺水者在淹没之前通常只能在水面上挣扎20-60秒。

words.tran: 能潜水的；能沉入水中的
浸没（submerse的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the action of going under water, or the state of being completely covered in liquid
